name: Sala - Vage Dragon
text:
1 Earth Tuner and one non-Tuner "Sala -" Monster
When this card is Summoned, target one "Sala -" Monster in your GY; equip it to this card and if you do, place two Sala Counters on this card. This card gains 500 ATK While a "Sala -" Monster is equipped to it. Once per turn, (Quick effect): When your opponent activates a card or effect, you can remove one Sala Counter from this card; Negate the activation and if you do, destroy it.
